News

25. July 2019
We are heading to ChinaVis 2019!

19. July 2019
Our paper ‘VIStory: Interactive Storyboard for Exploring Visual Information in Scientific Publications’ got accepted by VINCI 19

19. July 2019
Wei Zeng is invited to give a lecture ‘Recent advancements in movement data visualization’ at Peking University Visualization Summer School, and ChinaVis 2019.

08. May 2019
2 master students join our group!

08. May 2019
Dome makes it on the University website.

13. December 2018
Our paper about how to construct an STM is in Review of Scientific Instruments.

08. October 2018
We discovered charge trapping in a high-Tc superconductor! Publication in Nature Physics.

27. September 2018
Our MHz amplifier for STM is published in Review of Scientific Instruments.
